author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Boost mp11 is a more modern and lightweight metaprogramming library than boost::mpl.  We should  use mp11 where possible.

#### PR validation:


#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

@vgvassilev @davidlange6
title: Move boost::mpl to boost:mp11
